message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe we can reach a fair price. How about $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $10,500? This gives you a great deal while still being fair to me.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose $10,000 as a fair price.
